div.head: 好魘
div.div: to be prone to have nightmares

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: to be prone to have nightmares

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yan mei 魘寐 , nightmare. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry wa zeng 瓦甑：好 魘及無夢，取火燒死者灰，著枕中、履中即止 , “For proneness to nightmares and the absence of dreams: take the ashes of an incinerated corpse and deposit it in a headrest or in a shoe. This will stop it”.
